# Contributing to SORCE Collective

Thank you for your interest in contributing to SORCE Collective! This site is collaboratively maintained by our community of artist-academics.

## Ways to Contribute

### Quick Edits
Every page has an "Suggest an edit on GitHub" link. Click it to propose changes directly.

### Blog Posts
1. Fork this repository
2. Create a new file in `_posts/` named `YYYY-MM-DD-your-title.md`
3. Add the required front matter (see existing posts for examples)
4. Write your content in Markdown
5. Submit a pull request

### People Profiles
1. Fork this repository
2. Create a new file in `_people/` named `your-name.md`
3. Add your profile information (see `_people/example-member.md`)
4. Submit a pull request

### Resources
Open an issue using the "Resource Suggestion" template, or edit `resources.md` directly.

### Initiatives
Open an issue using the "Initiative Proposal" template.

## Guidelines

- Write in clear, accessible language
- Use Markdown formatting
- Include alt text for images
- Test links before submitting

## Code of Conduct

We follow the [Contributor Covenant](https://www.contributor-covenant.org/). Please be respectful and inclusive in all interactions.

## Questions?

Open a [Discussion](../../discussions) or reach out to the collective.
